home.headline: Build technology with Humans powered by Artificial Intelligence
home.subheadline: NOVA helps you understand and build any software faster, easier, sustainable
home.inputPlaceholder: What do you want to build?
home.errorConnect: Unable to connect to NOVA. Please check your connection and try again.
home.errorProcess: An error occurred while processing the response. Please try again.
home.errorSystem: The system could not complete this turn. Try again in a moment.

discovery.greetingMsg: Hi! I'm NOVA, your AI-powered product advisor. I'll help you define your product, technical requirements, and project scope — no technical knowledge required. Let's build your vision together.
discovery.askProjectType: Let's start with the basics. What type of product are you thinking about?
discovery.ackProjectType: Great choice! A {type} — that already tells me a lot about the architecture we'll need.
discovery.askIndustry: What industry or domain is this product for? This helps me understand compliance needs, user expectations, and best practices for your sector.
discovery.ackIndustry: Got it — the {industry} space has specific requirements I'll keep in mind.
discovery.askProblem: Every great product solves a real problem. What specific pain point or challenge does your product address? Who currently struggles with this?
discovery.problemPlaceholder: E.g. Small businesses waste hours manually tracking inventory across multiple spreadsheets...
discovery.ackProblem: That's a clear and compelling problem to solve. This gives the product a strong purpose.
discovery.askDescription: Now, describe your product vision. What should it do? How do you imagine people using it? Don't worry about technical details — just paint the picture.
discovery.descriptionPlaceholder: E.g. I want to build a platform where freelancers can find projects, manage contracts, and get paid automatically...
discovery.ackDescription: I can see the vision clearly. This is a solid product concept with real market potential.
discovery.askAudience: Who are the primary users of this product?
discovery.ackAudience: Targeting {audience} — that shapes the UX approach, marketing strategy, and technical decisions.
discovery.askUserRoles: Will there be different types of users with different access levels? For example: admin, regular user, manager, guest, etc. Describe the main roles.
discovery.userRolesPlaceholder: E.g. Admin who manages everything, Vendors who list products, Customers who browse and buy...
discovery.ackUserRoles: Clear user hierarchy. This is essential for building the right permissions and interfaces.
discovery.askFeatures: What are the most important features for the first version? Think about the core functionality that makes this product valuable — the features users can't live without.
discovery.featuresPlaceholder: E.g. user registration, search & filters, real-time notifications, payment processing, analytics dashboard...
discovery.ackFeatures: Strong feature set. I'm already mapping out the technical components needed for each one.
discovery.askIntegrations: Does your product need to connect with any third-party services? For example: payment gateways (Stripe), email services, CRMs, social login, maps, AI/ML APIs, etc.
discovery.integrationsPlaceholder: E.g. Stripe for payments, Google Maps, SendGrid for emails, OAuth for social login...
discovery.ackIntegrations: Noted. These integrations will be factored into the architecture and development timeline.
discovery.askDesign: Do you have any design preferences? Any apps or websites you like the look and feel of? Any brand colors or style direction?
discovery.designPlaceholder: E.g. Clean and minimal like Linear.app, dark theme, brand colors are blue and white...
discovery.ackDesign: Great references. This helps our UI/UX team align with your vision from day one.
discovery.askScale: How many users do you expect in the first year? This impacts infrastructure, performance optimization, and cost planning.
discovery.ackScale: That helps me plan the right infrastructure — scalable from the start without over-engineering.
discovery.askTimeline: What's your ideal timeline? When would you like to have the first version ready?
discovery.ackTimeline: Noted. We'll align the scope with this timeline to ensure realistic delivery.
discovery.askStage: Where are you currently in the process?
discovery.ackStage: Perfect context. This tells me exactly where to pick things up.
discovery.askBudget: Almost done! What budget range are you considering for this project? This helps us recommend the right scope and team composition.
discovery.ackBudget: Understood. I now have a complete picture of your project.
discovery.summaryIntro: Here's a comprehensive summary of your product vision. Our senior team will review this before your call and come prepared with architecture recommendations, timeline, and a detailed proposal.
discovery.opt_idea: Just an idea — nothing built yet
discovery.opt_existing: I have an existing product to improve
discovery.opt_mvp: I need an MVP as fast as possible
discovery.scheduleSubtitle: Our senior team will review your project brief and come prepared with architecture, timeline, and proposal.

about.heroSubtitle: Senior engineers + artificial intelligence. No guesswork. No wasted weeks. Just clear, structured, predictable software development.
about.problemSubtitle: The traditional process wastes time, money, and trust before a single line of code is written.
about.problem1Desc: Requirements are unclear, leading to scope creep and missed deadlines. Sales calls and workshops consume weeks before real work begins.
about.problem2Desc: Budget overruns and project failures stem from guesswork disguised as professional estimates.
about.problem3Desc: Financial planning becomes impossible when every project is a moving target with hidden fees.
about.problem4Desc: Business and technical teams speak different languages, creating misalignment that compounds over time.
about.approachP1: NOVA is a software development company powered by
about.approachP1End: . Built to remove ambiguity from the very first interaction.
about.approachP2: AI structures ideas, extracts requirements, and creates technical specifications. Humans execute with precision, building software that meets real business needs.
about.coreSubtitle: It acts as a CTO, Business Analyst, and Product Manager combined. It guides you through an intelligent Q&A where questions adapt based on your answers. No technical knowledge required.
about.coreCallout: This is NOT a chatbot. This is a structured onboarding system that replaces weeks of discovery workshops.
about.step1Desc: Natural language conversation with NOVA. No technical jargon required.
about.step2Desc: Automated extraction of requirements, features, and technical specifications.
about.step3Desc: Structured information flows seamlessly to our senior developers.
about.step4Desc: A single call with senior developers instead of multiple discovery sessions.
about.step5Desc: Clear deliverables, tech stack, timeline, and expectations from the start.
about.step6Desc: Immediate start with full context and clarity. No wasted time.
about.processCallout1: AI doesn't replace humans. It makes collaboration
about.adv1Desc: Days instead of weeks. AI compresses the discovery phase into one intelligent conversation.
about.adv2Desc: Structured from the very start. No ambiguity, no guesswork, no back-and-forth confusion.
about.adv3Desc: AI-assisted architecture recommendations tailored precisely to your specific project needs.
about.adv4Desc: Accurate estimates upfront so you can plan your budget and timeline with confidence.
about.adv5Desc: Expert developers from day one. Every project gets the dedicated attention it deserves.
about.adv6Desc: One single source of truth. AI aligns business and technical teams from the first day.
about.builtForText1: Anyone who needs software built properly, without chaos. Whether you're validating an idea, scaling operations, or building internal tools — NOVA provides the same level of
about.ctaSubtitle: Start by talking to NOVA. It will help structure your idea before you speak with our team.

contact.title: Let's build something amazing together
contact.subtitle: Whether you have a clear vision or just an idea — we're ready to listen and turn it into reality. With speed, precision and predictable costs.
contact.talkToNovaDesc: Not ready for a call? Let NOVA help you structure your idea first.
contact.method1Desc: AI-powered conversation that structures your idea, extracts requirements, and prepares everything for our team.
contact.method2Desc: Book a focused call with our senior developers. We'll review your project and provide a clear plan forward.
contact.method3Desc: Prefer email? Write to us directly and we'll get back to you within 24 hours with next steps.
contact.faq1Q: How long does the process take?
contact.faq1A: From first conversation to project specification — typically 24 to 48 hours. Development starts immediately after agreement.
contact.faq2A: Not at all. NOVA guides you through the entire process in plain language. No jargon, no technical expertise required.
contact.faq3Q: What types of projects do you build?
contact.faq3A: Web apps, mobile apps, SaaS platforms, internal tools, APIs, and more. If it involves software, we can build it.
contact.faq4A: Every project is different. After the AI structures your requirements, we provide a transparent, fixed-price proposal.
contact.ctaSubtitle: The fastest path from idea to software starts here.
